CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper February 22, 1947, pg. 17, reads: "Superman Specimens - Here are some real examples of supermen who are expert weight-lifters of the Centre Avenue YMCA. Classes are held every Monday, Wednesday and Friday under supervision of the Centre Avenue 'Y,' directed by Pomeroyal Fountain. John Tolliver is instructor of the class. Weight-lifters are, left to right: William Madden, John Bennet and Robert Brooks. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Weight lifters William Madden, John Bennet and Robert Brooks wearing light colored shorts inscribed 716, posing with dumbbells and weights in gymnasium of Centre Avenue YMCA
